verses.verse: He who is wounded in the stones,<WH6481> or has his privy member<WH8212> cut off,<WH3772> shall not enter<WH935> into the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

A bastard<WH4464> shall not enter<WH935> into the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh;<WH3068> even to the tenth<WH6224> generation<WH1755> shall none of his enter<WH935> into the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

An Ammonite<WH5984> or a Moabite<WH4125> shall not enter<WH935> into the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh;<WH3068> even to the tenth<WH6224> generation<WH1755> shall none belonging to them enter<WH935> into the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh<WH3068> forever:<WH5769>

because<WH1697> they didn't<WH6923> meet you with bread<WH3899> and with water<WH4325> in the way,<WH1870> when you came forth<WH3318> out of Egypt,<WH4714> and because they hired<WH7936> against you Balaam<WH1109> the son<WH1121> of Beor<WH1160> from Pethor<WH6604> of Mesopotamia,<WH763> to curse you.<WH7043>

Nevertheless Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> wouldn't<WH14> listen<WH8085> to Balaam;<WH1109> but Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> turned<WH2015> the curse<WH7045> into a blessing<WH1293> to you,<WH3068> because Yahweh your God<WH430> loved you.<WH157>
You shall not seek<WH1875> their peace<WH7965> nor their prosperity<WH2896> all your days<WH3117> forever.<WH5769>
You shall not abhor<WH8581> an Edomite;<WH130> for he is your brother:<WH251> you shall not abhor<WH8581> an Egyptian,<WH4713> because you lived as a foreigner<WH1616> in his land.<WH776>
The children<WH1121> of the third<WH7992> generation<WH1755> who are born<WH3205> to them shall enter<WH935> into the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
When you go forth<WH3318> in camp<WH4264> against your enemies,<WH341> then you shall keep<WH8104> yourselves from every evil<WH7451> thing.<WH1697>

If there is among you any man<WH376> who is not clean<WH2889> by reason of that which happens<WH7137> him by night,<WH3915> then shall he go<WH3318> outside<WH2351> of the camp.<WH4264> He shall not come<WH935> within<WH8432> the camp:<WH4264>
but it shall be,<WH6153> when evening comes on,<WH6437> he shall bathe<WH7364> himself in water;<WH4325> and when the sun<WH8121> is down,<WH935> he shall come<WH935> within<WH8432> the camp.<WH4264>
You shall have a place also<WH3027> outside<WH2351> of the camp,<WH4264> where you shall go forth<WH3318> abroad:<WH2351>

and you shall have a paddle<WH3489> among your weapons;<WH240> and it shall be,<WH3427> when you sit down abroad,<WH2351> you shall dig<WH2658> therewith,<WH7725> and shall turn back and cover<WH3680> that which comes from you:<WH6627>

for Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> walks<WH1980> in the midst<WH7130> of your camp,<WH4264> to deliver<WH5337> you,<WH5414> and to give up your enemies<WH341> before<WH6440> you;<WH4264> therefore your camp shall be holy,<WH6918> that he may not see<WH7200> an unclean<WH6172> thing<WH1697> in you,<WH7725> and turn away from you.<WH310>
You shall not deliver<WH5462> to his master<WH113> a servant<WH5650> who is escaped<WH5337> from his master to you:<WH113>

he shall dwell<WH3427> with you,<WH7130> in the midst of you,<WH4725> in the place which he shall choose<WH977> within one<WH259> of your gates,<WH8179> where it pleases him best:<WH2896> you shall not oppress him.<WH3238>
There shall be no prostitute<WH6948> of the daughters<WH1323> of Israel,<WH3478> neither shall there be a sodomite<WH6945> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

You shall not bring<WH935> the hire<WH868> of a prostitute,<WH2181> or the wages<WH4242> of a dog,<WH3611> into the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> for any vow:<WH5088> for even both<WH8147> these are an abomination<WH8441> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

You shall not lend on interest<WH5391> to your brother;<WH251> interest<WH5391> of money,<WH3701> interest<WH5392> of food,<WH400> interest<WH5392> of anything<WH1697> that is lent on interest:<WH5391>

to a foreigner<WH5237> you may lend on interest;<WH5391> but to your brother<WH251> you shall not lend on interest,<WH5391> that Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> may bless<WH1288> you in all that you put<WH4916> your hand<WH3027> to,<WH776> in the land where you go<WH935> in to possess it.<WH3423>

When you shall vow<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> you shall not be slack<WH309> to pay<WH7999> it:<WH3068> for Yahweh your God<WH430> will surely<WH1875> require<WH1875> it of you;<WH2399> and it would be sin in you.
But if you shall forbear<WH2308> to vow,<WH5087> it shall be no sin in you.<WH2399>

That which is gone out<WH4161> of your lips<WH8193> you shall observe<WH8104> and do;<WH6213> according as you have vowed<WH5087> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> a freewill offering,<WH5071> which you have promised<WH1696> with your mouth.<WH6310>

When you come<WH935> into your neighbor<WH7453>'s vineyard,<WH3754> then you may eat<WH398> of grapes<WH6025> your fill<WH7648> at your own pleasure;<WH5315> but you shall not put<WH5414> any in your vessel.<WH3627>

When you come<WH935> into your neighbor<WH7453>'s standing grain,<WH7054> then you may pluck<WH6998> the ears<WH4425> with your hand;<WH3027> but you shall not move<WH5130> a sickle<WH2770> to your neighbor<WH7453>'s standing grain.<WH7054>
